column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.

column170: The MICA-MICs dataset provides raw and fully processed multimodal neuroimaging data acquired in 50 healthy control participants at a filed strength of 3T. Modalities include high-resolution anatomical (T1-weighted), microstructurally-sensitive (quantitative T1), diffusion-weighted and resting-state functional imaging. In addition, MICA-MICs provides ready-to-use connectomes built across multiple parcellation schemes based on brain anatomy, function, and histology (18 parcellations in total). Processed matrices are available for each imaging modality across a range of parcellation scales.
